attributes.action: Give students completing their GCSE exams a physics and maths formulae sheet
attributes.background: I believe that students sitting their GCSE exams should be allowed a formula sheet for maths and physics exams as it can be very daunting going into an exam and trying to remember all of the equations needed for the test

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Ensure GCSE students have support materials for maths and science exams in 2025
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651803
